beditor.view

Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • beditor.view.Sprite

  • public class Sprite
extends java.lang.Object
    Sprite : Displays a sprite from a picture
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Hugo PIGEON

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

    • Constructor Detail

      • Sprite

        public Sprite(javax.swing.JPanel pan,
      java.awt.Point coord,
      java.awt.Dimension dim,
      boolean checkClicks,
      boolean checkMoves)
        Constructor which makes a new sprite in the given panel with the specified coordinates and dimensions. Information about the events is also needed
        Parameters:
        pan - the panel which contains the sprite
        coord - the sprite's coordinates
        dim - the map's dimensions
        checkClicks - give true to allow mouse click events
        checkMoves - give true to allow mouse moves events

      • Sprite

        public Sprite(javax.swing.JPanel pan,
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage img,
      java.awt.Point coord,
      java.awt.Dimension dim,
      boolean checkClicks,
      boolean checkMoves)
        Constructor which makes a new sprite in the given panel with the specified picture. The displayed picture is a part of the given one. Information about the events is also needed
        Parameters:
        pan - the panel which contains the sprite
        img - the loaded picture to create the "subimage"
        coord - the "subimage"'s coordinates
        dim - the "subimage"'s dimensions
        checkClicks - give true to allow mouse click events
        checkMoves - give true to allow mouse moves events
